title: Coronavirus: Pep Guardiola urges 'football family' to 'stay inside and stay safe'
description: Manchester City head coach donated £918,000 to aid the battle against coronavirus in Spain
content:
Pep Guardiola is deeply missing football but the Manchester City manager underlined the importance of staying safe by remaining at home during the coronavirus crisis.
